subject: Re: Something neat,
author: Adrienne
full_text:
Snowfire,

I know you don't hear from me much as far as posting is concerned but I follow to learn.

This sounds interesting.  Could you explain how this is happening?

Thank you,

Adrienne

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> I know, your all going to think I've gone bonkers, but!  David says  the 
> moon and sun are lifting the radiation from our planet right now, isn't that  
> cool?  Courtesy of God. <s> sf
